segments.text: Does anyone mind me turning on the air conditioning ? It's hot in here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I prefer if you didn't . Air conditioning makes me sneeze .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'm opening the window , though , is that OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , sure . It's very stuffy in here .
segments.speaker: S2
